==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|けい|ひん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From the second character of [[東京]] ''[[Tokyo]]'' and the second charcater of [[横浜]] ''[[Yokohama]]''.

===Pronunciation===
* Common Accent: {{ja-accent-common|atamadaka|け|いひん|kéìhìǹ}} or {{ja-accent-common|heiban|け|いひん|hèíhíń}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|けいひん}}
